## User Input

```text
$ARGUMENTS
```

You **MUST** consider the user input before proceeding (if not empty).

## Goal

Perform analysis based on the users input, suggest options if sensible options exist. 


## Operating Constraints

**STRICTLY READ-ONLY**: DO **NOT** MAKE ANY CHANGES TO ANY FILE INCLUDING DOCUMENTAION DURING THEIS REQUEST. Offer an optional remediation plan (user must explicitly approve before any follow-up editing commands would be invoked manually).
